name: pnp-devproxy-demo-randomerror-js
title: Demo: Simulate random error responses from a custom API
shortDescription: This sample contains a demo web application connected to a placeholder API. Using Dev Proxy, you can simulate random errors returned by the API and see how the app handles them.
